meanings.definition: Women's underwear that is skimpy or revealing.
meanings.sent1: She felt embarrassed when her scanties peeked out from her skirt.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new pair of scanties for a special occasion.
meanings.sent3: She giggled as she realized she accidentally wore her scanties inside out.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence soared as she strutted in her new scanties.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of her scanties made them stand out.

meanings.definition: Barely sufficient or inadequate in amount or degree.
meanings.sent1: He had a scanties amount of time to finish the project.
meanings.sent2: The scanties supply of food was not enough for the party.
meanings.sent3: The team's performance was met with laughter due to their scanties effort.
meanings.sent4: Her scanties knowledge of the subject was evident during the test.
meanings.sent5: The scanties light in the room barely illuminated the space.
